text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha darabtum fi sabili l-lahi fatabayyanu wala taqulu liman alqa ilaykumu l-salama lasta mu'minan tabtaghuna 平arada l-hayati l-dun'ya fa平inda l-lahi maghanimu kathiratun kadhalika kuntum min qablu famanna l-lahu 平alaykum fatabayyanu inna l-laha kana bima ta平maluna khabiran
